ticket.title: ASICS changes: Shoe Advisor etc.
ticket.original-body:
Shoe Advisor 1.Change the text of the word “severly” => “severely” 2.Change all Shoe adviser => Shoe advisor system-wide. Including URL. 3.Remove the introduction line “Hello {name},”
Flagship Store 1. Information in boxes in Running Clinics should have same fonts, weights, spacing and should align. The titles “Who can Join” and “About the Running Clinics” should be a little bigger font and the same blue color as used elsewhere on the page titles.
Product Page 1. Some technology text is cut.
Product Catalog 1. Catalog migration problems. MIssing a lot of products in all categories. Compare all categories (hockey, netball, running, etc.) 2. http://www.uk.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/running/products/apparel/ => title is broken
Category Product Top (e.g. /running/products) 1. Currently many countries have less than 4 products listed. Change behavior so that if < 4 products are selected, the remaining 4 products are automatically displayed. 2. Product selection widget deletion problem: deleting a product did not remove from page.
Product Top (/products) 1. Only show more sports if there are more sports.
Walking Page 1. Move My ASICS widget to right side of Walking so that the page has better balance.

Shoe Advisor 1.Change the text of the word “severly” => “severely” 2.Change all Shoe adviser => Shoe advisor system-wide. Including URL. 3.Remove the introduction line “Hello {name},”
Flagship Store 1. Information in boxes in Running Clinics should have same fonts, weights, spacing and should align. The titles “Who can Join” and “About the Running Clinics” should be a little bigger font and the same blue color as used elsewhere on the page titles.
Product Page 1. Some technology text is cut.
Product Catalog 1. Catalog migration problems. MIssing a lot of products in all categories. Compare all categories (hockey, netball, running, etc.) 2. http://www.uk.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/running/products/apparel/ => title is broken
Category Product Top (e.g. /running/products) 1. Currently many countries have less than 4 products listed. Change behavior so that if < 4 products are selected, the remaining 4 products are automatically displayed. 2. Product selection widget deletion problem: deleting a product did not remove from page.
Product Top (/products) 1. Only show more sports if there are more sports.
Walking Page 1. Move My ASICS widget to right side of Walking so that the page has better balance.
ticket.original-body-html:
Shoe Advisor
1.Change the text of the word “severly” => “severely”
2.Change all Shoe adviser => Shoe advisor system-wide. Including URL.
3.Remove the introduction line “Hello {name},”

Flagship Store
1. Information in boxes in Running Clinics should have same fonts, weights, spacing and should align. The titles “Who can Join” and “About the Running Clinics” should be a little bigger font and the same blue color as used elsewhere on the page titles.

Product Page
1. Some technology text is cut.

Product Catalog
1. Catalog migration problems. MIssing a lot of products in all categories. Compare all categories (hockey, netball, running, etc.)
2. http://www.uk.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/running/products/apparel/ => title is broken

Category Product Top (e.g. /running/products)
1. Currently many countries have less than 4 products listed. Change behavior so that if < 4 products are selected, the remaining 4 products are automatically displayed.
2. Product selection widget deletion problem: deleting a product did not remove from page.

Product Top (/products)
1. Only show more sports if there are more sports.

Walking Page
1. Move My ASICS widget to right side of Walking so that the page has better balance.
